summary.span: 完整描述程序集的唯一标识。

span.span: Describes an assembly's unique identity in full.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象包含有关程序集的信息, 您可以使用该程序集绑定到该程序集。The object contains information about an assembly, which you can use to bind to that assembly. 程序集的标识由以下内容组成:An assembly's identity consists of the following: - 简单名称。Simple name. - 版本号。Version number. - 加密密钥对。Cryptographic key pair. - 支持的区域性。Supported culture. 简单名称通常是清单文件的文件名, 但不包含扩展名。The simple name is typically the file name for the manifest file without its extension. 密钥对包括公钥和私钥, 用于为程序集创建强名称签名。The key pair includes a public and private key, used to create strong-name signatures for assemblies. 所有支持公共语言运行时的编译器都将发出嵌套类的简单名称, 并且在查询时, 反射将按照以下约定构造错位的名称。All compilers that support the common language runtime will emit the simple name of a nested class, and reflection constructs a mangled name when queried, in accordance with the following conventions. |后面Delimiter|含义Meaning| |---------------|-------------| |反斜杠 (\\)Backslash (\\)|转义符。Escape character.| |逗号 (,)Comma (,)|在程序集名称之前。Precedes the assembly name.| |加号 (+)Plus sign (+)|在嵌套类之前。Precedes a nested class.| 例如, 类的完全限定名称可能如下所示:For example, the fully qualified name for a class might look like this: ContainingClass + NestedClass、MyAssemblyContainingClass+NestedClass,MyAssembly "+ +"\\变成 "\\++\\\\",而""\\变成 ""。A "++" becomes "\\+\\+", and a "\\" becomes "\\\\". 此限定名称可以保留, 以后用于加载。This qualified name can be persisted and later used to load the . 若要搜索并加载, 请将与类型名称一起使用, 或者使用带有程序集限定类型名称的。To search for and load a , use either with the type name only or with the assembly qualified type name. 只有类型名称才会在调用方的程序集中查找, 然后在系统程序集中查找。 with the type name only will look for the in the caller's assembly and then in the System assembly. 具有程序集限定类型名称的将在任何程序集中查找。 with the assembly qualified type name will look for the in any assembly. 完全指定的必须具有名称、区域性、公钥或公钥令牌、主版本、次版本、内部版本号和修订号参数。A fully specified must have the name, culture, public key or public key token, major version, minor version, build number, and revision number parameters. 最后四个封装在类型中。The last four are packaged in the type. 若要创建一个简单名称, 请使用无参数构造函数创建一个对象, 并设置。To create a simple name, create an object using the parameterless constructor and set the . 其他属性是可选的。The other properties are optional. 若要创建完整的强名称, 请使用无参数构造函数创建一个对象 , 并设置和。To create a full strong name, create an object using the parameterless constructor and set the and . 其他属性是可选的。The other properties are optional. 使用 和设置公钥和强名称。Use and to set the public key and the strong name. 强名称签名总是使用哈希算法。The strong name signing always uses the hash algorithm. 若要确保正确构造名称, 请使用以下属性:To ensure that the names are constructed correctly, use the following properties: - - - 还可以通过将`/l`选项与[gacutil.exe (全局程序集缓存工具)](~/docs/framework/tools/gacutil-exe-gac-tool.md)一起使用来获取该名称。You can also get the name by using the `/l` option with the [Gacutil.exe (Global Assembly Cache Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/gacutil-exe-gac-tool.md) 对于部分指定的强名称, 请使用无参数构造函数创建一个对象, 并设置名称和公钥。For a partially specified strong name, create an object using the parameterless constructor and set the name and public key. 使用此类创建的程序集以后可以使用程序集链接器 (al.exe) 进行签名。An assembly created using such an can be signed later using the Assembly Linker (Al.exe). 可以指定具有不一致值的公钥和。It is possible to specify a public key and a with inconsistent values. 这对于开发人员方案非常有用。This can be useful in developer scenarios. 在这种情况下, 使用检索到的公钥指定了正确的公钥, 而指定了在开发过程中使用的公钥和私钥。In this case, the public key retrieved with specifies the correct public key, while the specifies the public and private keys used during development. 当运行时检测到与公钥不匹配时, 会在注册表中查找与公钥匹配的正确密钥。When the runtime detects a mismatch between the and the public key, it looks up in the registry the correct key that matches the public key. 显示名称的格式是以逗号分隔的以名称开头的 Unicode 字符串, 如下所示:The format of the display name of an is a comma-delimited Unicode string that begins with the name, as follows: `Name <,Culture = CultureInfo> <,Version = Major.Minor.Build.Revision> <, StrongName> <,PublicKeyToken> '\0'` `Name`程序集的文本名称。`Name` is the textual name of the assembly. `CultureInfo`是 RFC1766 格式定义的区域性。`CultureInfo` is the RFC1766-format-defined culture. `Major`、 `Minor`、和`Revision`是程序集的主版本、次版本、内部版本号和修订号。 `Build``Major`, `Minor`, `Build`, and `Revision` are the major version, minor version, build number, and revision number of the assembly. `StrongName`使用 SHA-1 哈希算法生成的公钥哈希值的十六进制编码低序位64位, 以及由指定的公钥。`StrongName` is the hexadecimal-encoded low-order 64 bits of the hash value of the public key generated using the SHA-1 hashing algorithm and the public key specified by . `PublicKeyToken`由指定的十六进制编码的公钥。`PublicKeyToken` is the hexadecimal-encoded public key specified by . 十六进制编码定义为二进制对象的每个字节转换为两个十六进制字符 (从最小到最高有效字节) 的转换。Hexadecimal encoding is defined as the conversion of each byte of a binary object to two hexadecimal characters, progressing from least to most significant byte. 将根据需要添加其他显示值。Additional display values will be added as deemed necessary. 如果已知道完整的公钥, 则可能会将 PublicKey 替换为 Stackexchange.redis.strongname。If the full public key is known, then PublicKey may be substituted for StrongName. 另请注意, 除`Name`(必须首先出现) 外, 参数的词法顺序并不重要。Also note that except for `Name`, which must come first, the lexical order of parameters is unimportant. 但是, 未专门设置`Version`的`Culture` `PublicKey` `StrongName` 任何参数 (、或) 都被视为省略, 然后将被视为 partial。However, any parameter (`Version`, `Culture`, `StrongName` or `PublicKey`) not specifically set is considered to be omitted, and the is then considered partial. 指定部分信息时, 必须按照上述顺序指定名称参数。When specifying partial information, Name parameters must be specified in the order described above. 提供显示名称时, 约定`StrongName =null`或`PublicKey= null`指示是否需要针对简单命名的程序集的绑定和匹配。When supplying a display name, the convention `StrongName =null` or `PublicKey= null` indicates that binding and matching against a simply named assembly is required. 此外, 约定`Culture= ""` (表示空字符串的双引号) 指示与默认区域性匹配。Additionally, the convention `Culture= ""` (double quote representing an empty string) indicates matching against the default culture. 下面的示例演示了一个具有默认区域性的简单命名的程序集。The following example shows an for a simply named assembly with default culture. ``` ExampleAssembly, Culture="" ``` 下面的示例演示区域性为“en”的强名称程序集的完全指定的引用。The following example shows a fully specified reference for a strongly named assembly with culture "en". ``` ExampleAssembly, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=en, PublicKeyToken=a5d015c7d5a0b012 ``` ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用各种反射类来分析包含在程序集中的元数据。This example shows how to use various reflection classes to analyze the metadata contained in an assembly. [!code-cpp[Reflection#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Reflection/CPP/reflection.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Reflection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Reflection/CS/Reflection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Reflection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Reflection/VB/Reflection.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个名为`MyAssembly.exe`的动态程序集, 并将其保存到硬盘上。The following example creates a dynamic assembly named `MyAssembly.exe` and saves it to your hard disk. 运行该示例后, 可以使用[Ildasm (IL 拆装器)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)来检查程序集元数据。After running the example, you can use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to examine the assembly metadata. [!code-cpp[AssemblyName_Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_Constructor/CPP/assemblyname_constructor.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyName_Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_Constructor/CS/assemblyname_constructor.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AssemblyName_Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_Constructor/VB/assemblyname_constructor.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用指定的显示名称初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified display name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将分析`assemblyName`提供的, 并通过显示名称中的值初始化新的相应字段。The supplied `assemblyName` is parsed, and the appropriate fields of the new are initialized with values from the display name. 这是分析显示名称的建议方法。This is the recommended way of parsing display names. 建议不要编写自己的代码来分析显示名称。Writing your own code to parse display names is not recommended. ## Examples 下面的示例从显示名称创建的一个实例。The following example creates an instance of from a display name. 显示名称的各个元素作为对象的属性输出到控制台。The individual elements of the display name are output to the console as properties of the object. [!code-cpp[AssemblyName_Constructor_2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_Constructor_2/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyName_Constructor_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_Constructor_2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AssemblyName_Constructor_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_Constructor_2/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置程序集的 URL 位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the location of the assembly as a URL.

value.span: 一个字符串，它是程序集的 URL 位置。

span.span: A string that is the URL location of the assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 加载程序集时, 还可以使用属性获取此值。When an assembly is loaded, this value can also be obtained using the property. 如果程序集作为字节数组加载, 则此属性返回方法重载的调用方的位置, 而不是已加载的程序集的位置。If the assembly was loaded as a byte array, this property returns the location of the caller of the method overload, not the location of the loaded assembly. > [!NOTE] > 不要使用 只带有属性集的。Do not use an with only the property set. 属性不提供程序集标识的任何元素 (如名称或版本), 因此, 不会按照按标识规则加载规则进行加载, 这与方法一样。 The property does not supply any elements of the assembly identity (such as name or version), so loading does not occur according to load-by-identity rules, as you would expect from the method. 而是使用加载 "规则" 加载程序集。Instead, the assembly is loaded using load-from rules. 有关使用加载源上下文的缺点的信息, 请参阅 [程序集加载](~/docs/framework/deployment/best-practices-for-assembly-loading.md)的方法重载或最佳做法。For information about the disadvantages of using the load-from context, see the method overload or [Best Practices for Assembly Loading](~/docs/framework/deployment/best-practices-for-assembly-loading.md). ## Examples 下面的示例将发出一个动态程序集, 并将其保存到当前目录中。The following example emits a dynamic assembly and saves it to the current directory. 创建程序集后, 属性用于指定保存程序集的目录。When the assembly is created, the property is used to specify the directory where the assembly is saved. [!code-cpp[AssemblyName_CodeBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_CodeBase/CPP/assemblyname_codebase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyName_CodeBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_CodeBase/CS/assemblyname_codebase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AssemblyName_CodeBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_CodeBase/VB/assemblyname_codebase.vb#1)]

[!code-cpp[AssemblyName_KeyPair#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_KeyPair/CPP/assemblyname_keypair.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyName_KeyPair#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_KeyPair/CS/assemblyname_keypair.cs#4)] [!code-vb[AssemblyName_KeyPair#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_KeyPair/VB/assemblyname_keypair.vb#4)]

summary.span: 获取程序集的全名（也称为显示名称）。

span.span: Gets the full name of the assembly, also known as the display name.

value.span: 作为程序集的全名（也称为显示名称）的字符串。

span.span: A string that is the full name of the assembly, also known as the display name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 显示名称通常由简单名称、版本号、支持的区域性和公钥组成。The display name typically consists of the simple name, version number, supported culture, and public key. 例如:For example: ``` mylib, Version=1.2.1900.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=a14f3033def15840 ``` 建议不要编写自己的代码来分析显示名称。Writing your own code to parse display names is not recommended. 而是将显示名称传递到构造函数, 该构造函数对其进行分析, 并填充新的相应字段。Instead, pass the display name to the constructor, which parses it and populates the appropriate fields of the new . 加载程序集时, 还可以使用属性获取此值。When an assembly is loaded, this value can also be obtained using the property. ## Examples 下面的示例将发出一个动态程序集, 并将其保存到当前目录中。The following example emits a dynamic assembly and saves it to the current directory. 创建程序集后, 代码示例将设置、 、 和属性, 这些属性共同构成程序集的完整名称或显示名称。When the assembly is created, the code example sets the , , , and properties, which together comprise an assembly's full name, or display name. 然后 , 使用属性来检索显示名称。The property is then used to retrieve the display name. [!code-cpp[AssemblyName_CodeBase#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_CodeBase/CPP/assemblyname_codebase.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyName_CodeBase#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_CodeBase/CS/assemblyname_codebase.cs#4)] [!code-vb[AssemblyName_CodeBase#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_CodeBase/VB/assemblyname_codebase.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当文件包含程序集清单时, 此操作才有效。This will only work if the file contains an assembly manifest. 此方法会导致文件打开和关闭, 但不会将程序集添加到此域中。This method causes the file to be opened and closed, but the assembly is not added to this domain. ## Examples 下面的示例获取磁盘上的程序集的。The following example gets the for an assembly on disk. 除非您将字符串 "MyAssembly" 替换为您的硬盘上的程序集的文件名 (如有必要), 否则它将不会运行。It will not run unless you replace the string "MyAssembly.exe" with the file name of an assembly (including the path, if necessary) on your hard disk. 或者, 您可以将此示例编译为 "MyAssembly"。Alternatively, you can compile this example as "MyAssembly.exe". [!code-cpp[AssemblyName_GetAssemblyName#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_GetAssemblyName/CPP/assemblyname_getassemblyname.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyName_GetAssemblyName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_GetAssemblyName/CS/assemblyname_getassemblyname.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AssemblyName_GetAssemblyName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_GetAssemblyName/VB/assemblyname_getassemblyname.vb#1)]

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance unsigned int8[] GetPublicKey() cil managed

summary.span: 获取程序集的公钥。

span.span: Gets the public key of the assembly.

returns.span: 字节数组，包含程序集的公钥。

span.span: A byte array that contains the public key of the assembly.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例将发出一个动态程序集, 并将其保存到当前目录中。The following example emits a dynamic assembly and saves it to the current directory. 创建程序集时, 方法用于为程序集指定一个公钥。When the assembly is created, the method is used to give the assembly a public key. 然后, 使用方法来检索向控制台显示的公钥。 The method is then used to retrieve the public key, which is displayed to the console. [!code-cpp[AssemblyName_KeyPair#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_KeyPair/CPP/assemblyname_keypair.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyName_KeyPair#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_KeyPair/CS/assemblyname_keypair.cs#2)] [!code-vb[AssemblyName_KeyPair#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_KeyPair/VB/assemblyname_keypair.vb#2)]

exception.span: 提供了公钥（例如使用 方法），但未提供公钥标记。

span.span: A public key was provided (for example, by using the method), but no public key token was provided.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance unsigned int8[] GetPublicKeyToken() cil managed

summary.span: 获取公钥标记，该标记为应用程序或程序集签名时所用公钥的 SHA-1 哈希值的最后 8 个字节。

span.span: Gets the public key token, which is the last 8 bytes of the SHA-1 hash of the public key under which the application or assembly is signed.

returns.span: 包含公钥调用的字节数组。

span.span: A byte array that contains the public key token.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例将发出一个动态程序集, 并将其保存到当前目录中。The following example emits a dynamic assembly and saves it to the current directory. 创建程序集时, 方法用于设置程序集的公钥标记。When the assembly is created, the method is used to set the assembly's public key token. 然后 , 使用方法来检索向控制台显示的公钥标记。The method is then used to retrieve the public key token, which is displayed to the console. [!code-cpp[AssemblyName_KeyPair#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_KeyPair/CPP/assemblyname_keypair.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyName_KeyPair#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_KeyPair/CS/assemblyname_keypair.cs#3)] [!code-vb[AssemblyName_KeyPair#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_KeyPair/VB/assemblyname_keypair.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Configuration::Assemblies::AssemblyHashAlgorithm HashAlgorithm { System::Configuration::Assemblies::AssemblyHashAlgorithm get(); void set(System::Configuration::Assemblies::AssemblyHashAlgorithm value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置程序集清单使用的哈希算法。

span.span: Gets or sets the hash algorithm used by the assembly manifest.

value.span: 程序集清单使用的哈希算法。

span.span: The hash algorithm used by the assembly manifest.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 从开始 ,方法返回的对象的属性为 (如果引用的程序集没有哈希算法), 或者如果引用的哈希算法的哈希算法[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]枚举未标识程序集。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the property of an object that is returned by the method is if there is no hash algorithm for the referenced assembly, or if the hash algorithm of the referenced assembly is not identified by the enumeration. 在以前版本的 .NET Framework 中, 此情况下返回了属性。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, the property returned in this situation. ## Examples 下面的示例将发出一个动态程序集, 并将其保存到当前目录中。The following example emits a dynamic assembly and saves it to the current directory. 创建程序集后, 属性用于设置程序集清单的哈希算法。When the assembly is created, the property is used to set the hash algorithm for the assembly manifest. [!code-cpp[AssemblyName_CodeBase#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_CodeBase/CPP/assemblyname_codebase.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyName_CodeBase#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_CodeBase/CS/assemblyname_codebase.cs#3)] [!code-vb[AssemblyName_CodeBase#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_CodeBase/VB/assemblyname_codebase.vb#3)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用于为程序集创建强名称签名的加密公钥/私钥对。

span.span: Gets or sets the public and private cryptographic key pair that is used to create a strong name signature for the assembly.

value.span: 要用于为程序集创建强名称的加密公钥/私钥对。

span.span: The public and private cryptographic key pair to be used to create a strong name for the assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当运行时加载程序集时, 它不设置属性。When the runtime loads an assembly, it does not set the property. 仅当用户在使用对象创建动态程序集之前设置属性, 并随后想要检索密钥对时, 属性的 getter 才有用。The getter for the property is only useful if the user set the property before using the object to create a dynamic assembly, and subsequently wants to retrieve the key pair. ## Examples 下面的示例将发出一个动态程序集, 并将其保存到当前目录中。The following example emits a dynamic assembly and saves it to the current directory. 创建程序集后, 属性用于设置程序集的公钥和私钥。When the assembly is created, the property is used to set the assembly's public and private cryptographic keys. 。. [!code-cpp[AssemblyName_KeyPair#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_KeyPair/CPP/assemblyname_keypair.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyName_KeyPair#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_KeyPair/CS/assemblyname_keypair.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AssemblyName_KeyPair#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_KeyPair/VB/assemblyname_keypair.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置程序集的简单名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the simple name of the assembly.

summary.span: 这通常（但不一定）是程序集的清单文件的文件名，不包括其扩展名。

span.span: This is usually, but not necessarily, the file name of the manifest file of the assembly, minus its extension.
The simple name of the assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 清单文件是包含程序集清单的文件。The manifest file is the file that contains the assembly manifest. 例如, 名为 "MyAssembly" 的单文件程序集的简单名称为 "MyAssembly"。For example, the simple name of a single-file assembly named "MyAssembly.dll" is "MyAssembly". ## Examples 下面的示例将发出一个动态程序集, 并将其保存到当前目录中。The following example emits a dynamic assembly and saves it to the current directory. 创建程序集后, 属性用于设置动态程序集的简单名称。When the assembly is created, the property is used to set the simple name of the dynamic assembly. remarks.format: ## Remarks 比较仅依赖于简单的程序集名称。The comparison depends only on the simple assembly name. 它忽略版本、区域性和公钥标记。It ignores version, culture, and public key token.

value.span: 一个对象，表示程序集的主版本号、次版本号、内部版本号和修订号。

span.span: An object that represents the major, minor, build, and revision numbers of the assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 版本的所有组件都必须是大于或等于零的整数。All components of the version must be integers greater than or equal to zero. 元数据将程序集的主要版本号、次要版本号、内部版本号和修订版本限制为最大值-1。Metadata restricts the major, minor, build, and revision components for an assembly to a maximum value of - 1. 如果某个组件超出此值, 则不会引发错误;但在动态程序集中, 该组件为零。If a component exceeds this value, no error is thrown; however, in a dynamic assembly, that component is zero. ## Examples 本部分包含两个示例。This section contains two examples. 第一个示例演示如何检索当前正在执行的程序集的版本。The first example shows how to retrieve the version of the currently executing assembly. 第二个示例演示如何使用属性在发出动态程序集时指定程序集版本。The second example shows how to use the property to specify the assembly version when you emit a dynamic assembly. **示例1****Example 1** 下面的示例检索并显示当前正在执行的程序集和包含该类的程序集的版本号。The following example retrieves and displays the version numbers of the currently executing assembly and the assembly that contains the class. [!code-cpp[AssemblyName.Version#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName.Version/cpp/Example.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyName.Version#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName.Version/cs/Example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AssemblyName.Version#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName.Version/vb/Example.vb#1)] **示例2****Example 2** 下面的示例将发出一个动态程序集, 并将其保存到当前目录中。The following example emits a dynamic assembly and saves it to the current directory. 创建程序集后, 属性用于指定程序集的版本信息。When the assembly is created, the property is used to specify version information for the assembly. [!code-cpp[AssemblyName_Constructor#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_Constructor/CPP/assemblyname_constructor.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyName_Constructor#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_Constructor/CS/assemblyname_constructor.cs#3)] [!code-vb[AssemblyName_Constructor#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_Constructor/VB/assemblyname_constructor.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Configuration::Assemblies::AssemblyVersionCompatibility VersionCompatibility { System::Configuration::Assemblies::AssemblyVersionCompatibility get(); void set(System::Configuration::Assemblies::AssemblyVersionCompatibility value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置与程序集同其他程序集的兼容性相关的信息。

span.span: Gets or sets the information related to the assembly's compatibility with other assemblies.

value.span: 一个值，表示有关程序集同其他程序集的兼容性的信息。

span.span: A value that represents information about the assembly's compatibility with other assemblies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如, 指示程序集无法与其他版本并行执行, 因为设备驱动程序发生冲突。 information indicates, for example, that the assembly cannot execute side-by-side with other versions due to conflicts over a device driver. 当前, 始终返回, 且不由加载程序使用。Currently, always returns , and is not used by the loader. 此属性保留供将来使用。This property is reserved for a future feature.
